title: "Drones to Ploughshares" by Sarah Gailey
description: A sentient government surveillance drone is ensnared, and must determine his captor's motives. For more from Sarah Gailey, visit www.sarahgailey.com.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (Stitcher)
